Intro.text: Hello, player, welcome to my game.
In this game, you will play as an underground private detective. By conversing with five different NPCs, you will acquire items, abilities, and evidence to reconstruct the crime process.
There are two phases in this game: Collecting evidence, and confronting the suspects.

In the first phase, you will converse with five NPCs. The right choices can provide positive feedback to increase your win rate. Conversely, wrong or inappropriate choices may penalize you, decreasing your win rate. Note: The highest win rate is 100%, and the lowest is -100%.
Among the five NPCs, the librarian, female butler, and postman provide evidence. By talking to them, you can collect evidence.
The chief of police and the doctor provide abilities. By conversing with them and choosing the correct options, you will acquire certain abilities (positive or negative) to use in the second phase.

In the second phase, you will directly confront the suspect of the case. During this, the suspect will tell lies. Choose the correct evidence you have as bullets to hit the sentences that represent lies. Doing so will allow you to continue exposing the suspect. Otherwise, you won't be able to effectively accuse them, resulting in their escape (failure). Once you break through all of the suspect's lies, they will have no more excuses and will confess (success).

Here's the case introduction: A renowned businessman suddenly died at a private party at his home. The autopsy report showed the cause of death as a sudden heart attack with a drug reaction. However, what makes this case suspicious is that the deceased was always in good health and had no history of heart disease. Your task is to investigate this murder. After obtaining sufficient evidence, you will confront the suspect, using the evidence to break through the criminal's lies.

Librarian.text: Ah, welcome to the library. Is there a particular topic you're interested in?
Librarian.Option_One_Text: Ask about books on heart diseases or related medications.
Librarian.Option_Two_Text: Ask if the librarian has any interesting novel recommendations.

Librarian.text: Heart diseases, you say? What exactly are you looking for?
Librarian.Option_One_Text: Inquire about specialized books on rare heart medications.
Librarian.Option_Two_Text: Request any medical books related to heart diseases.

Librarian.text: Looking for something intriguing to read?
Librarian.Option_One_Text: Ask if there are novels themed around heart diseases.
Librarian.Option_Two_Text: Just looking for a book to pass the time.

Librarian.text: Indeed, we do have a few rare publications on that subject. Let me show you where they are.
Certainly, we have a comprehensive section on medical science. Follow me, please.
Well, we have a wide range of novels. Any particular genre you prefer?
Heart diseases in novels? That's quite specific, but I'll check. Please wait a moment.

Chief.text: Good day, detective. What can I assist you with?
Chief.Option_One_Text: Ask if the chief noticed any unusual activities around the victim or suspect.
Chief.Option_Two_Text: Ask if the chief encountered any interesting or strange cases recently.

Chief.text: Let me think for a moment...
Chief.Option_One_Text: Inquire if the chief recalls any suspicious incidents related to the victim or suspect.
Chief.Option_Two_Text: Confirm the usual policing around the victim or suspect’s area.

Chief.text: Every day in law enforcement brings its own surprises.
Chief.Option_One_Text: Ask if the chief remembers dealing with any bizarre or odd cases.
Chief.Option_Two_Text: Just curious about the chief’s daily duties.

Chief.text: Indeed, there was a suspicious incident near the victim's residence recently.
The areas around the victim and suspect were regularly patrolled, nothing unusual reported.
Well, we do encounter bizarre cases, but nothing directly related to this investigation.
Policing is a mix of routine and unexpected events. You always have to be prepared.

Postman.text: Good day! Anything postal-related I can help you with?
Postman.Option_One_Text: Ask if the postman noticed any unusual mail for the victim or suspect recently.
Postman.Option_Two_Text: Ask if the postman encountered any interesting or strange mail.

Postman.Option_One_Text: Inquire if the postman remembers the victim receiving any urgent or anonymous letters.
Postman.Option_Two_Text: Confirm the usual mail correspondence for the victim or suspect.

Postman.text: You never know what you'll find in the mail!
Postman.Option_One_Text: Ask if the postman remembers the victim receiving any advertisement or promotional letters.
Postman.Option_Two_Text: Just curious about the postman's daily work.

Postman.text: Now that you mention it, there was an anonymous letter sent to the victim a few days back.
Both the victim and the suspect had regular mail, nothing out of the ordinary.
It's a bit of everything, really. Every day is different, which keeps things interesting.
Adverts and promos? Sure, they got plenty of those. Nothing unusual there.

Housekeeper.text: Good day, may I assist you with something?
Housekeeper.Option_One_Text: Inquire about the details of the party that day.
Housekeeper.Option_Two_Text: Ask about the housekeeper's personal matters.

Housekeeper.text: Certainly, what would you like to know?
Housekeeper.Option_One_Text: Ask if the housekeeper noticed anything unusual.
Housekeeper.Option_Two_Text: Inquire about the housekeeper's responsibilities that day.

Housekeeper.Option_One_Text: Directly question if the housekeeper was involved in the murder.
Housekeeper.Option_Two_Text: Engage in trivial conversation with the housekeeper.

Housekeeper.text: Indeed, I did notice that the library door was ajar, which is most unusual since the master always keeps it locked.
I was primarily occupied with preparing the guest rooms and ensuring that all arrangements for the dinner were impeccable.
Well, the weather has been delightful recently, hasn't it? Just perfect for a walk in the garden.
How could you possibly think that? I have been devoted to this household for over 20 years!

Doctor.text: Greetings! How may I assist you in this medical inquiry?
Doctor.Option_One_Text: Ask if the doctor noticed any unusual symptoms or conditions in the victim or suspect.
Doctor.Option_Two_Text: Ask if the doctor encountered any peculiar or rare medical cases.

Doctor.Option_One_Text: Inquire if the doctor recalls any unusual medical reports concerning the victim or suspect.
Doctor.Option_Two_Text: Confirm the general health status of the victim and suspect.

Doctor.text: Medicine always has its share of mysteries.
Doctor.Option_One_Text: Ask if the doctor has dealt with any strange or uncommon illnesses.
Doctor.Option_Two_Text: Just curious about the doctor’s daily medical practice.

Doctor.text: Interestingly, the victim had symptoms that were not typical for their medical history.
Both the victim and the suspect seemed to be in normal health, based on their records.
Rare medical cases are not uncommon in my practice, but none are related to this case.
Medical practice is a balance of routine check-ups and unexpected diagnoses.
